msContents.summary: This is a single-text manuscript containing the Pañcarātrarakṣā of Vedāntadeśika. Cover folios are stitched with a thick white thread at the upper line, possibly for the sake of preservation.

msItem.title: Pañcarātrarakṣā
msItem.author: Vedāntadeśika
msItem.incipit:
cāturvyūhaṃ paraṃ brahma ṣāṭguṇyaparikarmmitaṃ | pāñcarātrasya kṛtsnasya prasūtiṃ paryupāsmahe | anananyadaivatasthāyiny āyatemahi te vayaṃ | pañcarātramahāṃbhodhi
pāradṛśvini sajjane |
msItem.explicit:
sibhiḥ | moghāśā parisandhi vimukhaiśvaryyamahāphalotgamadhiyā caryeyam ācāryatāṃ | tyaktaṃ śāstram alepakaprabhṛtibhiḥ kin tena tasyāgataṃ pradviṣṭaṃ jagadekacakṣuṣi divābhītai
s tatas tasya kiṃ | dugdhaṃ vipittahatair jugupsitam atas tasyāpi kiṃ dūrjanais tyaktañ ced api matkṛtaṃ suruciraṃ kin deśikais tyajyate |
msItem.finalRubric:
iti kavitārkikasimhasya sarvatantrasva
tantrasya śrimadveṃkaṭanāthasya śrīmadvedāntācāryyakṛtiṣu śrīpāñcarātrarakṣāyāṃ nityavyākhyānākhyas tritṛtīyodhikāraḥ | saṃpūrṇā ceyaṃ śrīpāñcarātrarakṣā |
hariḥ om· śubham astu śrīraṃganāyakīsametaśrīraṃganāthaparabrahmaṇe nmaḥ śrīmate hayagrīvāya nmaḥ śrīmate nigamāntamahāgurave nmaḥ śrīḥḥ |
msItem.colophon: jayanāmasaṃvatsaraṃ māśimāsaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣaṃ trayodaśiyil· godhū mēṟpaṭi lagnattil· yeḻuti mukiñcatu ceyalūr śrīnivāsan· svahastalikhitaṃ | śrīraghunandanaparabrahmaṇe nmaḥ

support.p: Thin palm leaf folio which are stiched at the upper side of the folio.

extent.measure: 1 blank folio 2 guard folio and 87 written folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numeration in the left margin on the recto of the folio.
supportDesc.condition: Good state of preservation with some folios having slight damage. Cover folios are in a delicate condition.

additions.desc: First guard folio, recto: śrīni (presumably an abbreviation of the scribe Śrīnivāsan's name)

Arabic number 50 in blue pen on left side of first guard folio, recto. A small scrap of paper is glued near the center with printed number 50 and 112 in blue pen. It partly covers up a line of canceled text and possibly the beginning of a phrase in Nandināgarī, which ends with māma.

First guard folio, recto:
śrīnivāsan
ceyalūr ācārryan
Second guard folio, recto: balhaṇacaritraṃ. Possibly a misplaced folio from another manuscript.

origin.origDate: According to the colophon the manuscript was completed approximately during the year 1894-95 in the month of Māgha (mid-February to mid-March) on the evening of the 13th day of the kṛṣṇapakṣa. It is written by Śrīnivāsan.
